result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher J Kopidlansky was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

miscConds.notes: Pay all mandatory costs and surcharges at a rate of $100 per month beginning on 12-24-2015 and continuing the 24th of each month thereafter. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
Obtain and maintain (full-time) employment or school or combination of both.
No contact with victim or address of the offense.

-Complete a Mental Health Evaluation;
-Participate in counseling deemed appropriate;

-Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment and successfully complete recommended treatment including random urine screens;
-Successfully complete any other counseling and/or treatment deemed appropriate.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher J Kopidlansky

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  

Defendant sentenced to serve days 4 months in the House of Correction. COURT STAYED THE SENTENCE and placed the defendant on probation with the State of Wisconsin, Department of Corrections for a period of 1 year.

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
     *   If revoked, Huber for work.
     *   Complete a Mental Health Evaluation.          
     *   Participate in counseling deemed appropriate.
     *   Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment
          and successfully complete recommended treatment
          including random urine screens.
     *   No contact with victim or address of the offense.
     *   Successfully complete any other counseling and/or
          treatment deemed appropriate.
     *   Pay all mandatory costs and surcharges at a rate of
           $100 per month beginning on 12/24/2015 and continuing
           the 24th of each month thereafter. Failure to pay will result
          in a civil judgment.
     *   Obtain and maintain (full-time) employment or school.
          combination of both.
     *  Defendant to provide a DNA sample.

 Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Rights and Pretrial Incarceration Credit,received and filed

Defendant Christopher J Kopidlansky in court with attorney John Francis Zeckel.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of constitutional rights and of maximum penalties, waived all rights and plead NO CONTEST.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights received and filed.  Stipulation by state and defense to complaint as factual basis to sustain plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.

Defendant Christopher J Kopidlansky in court with attorney John Francis Zeckel.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Court is in jury trial for today's proceedings.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Christopher J Kopidlansky in court with attorney John Francis Zeckel.  Alex Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 26, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
From Attorney John F. Zeckel on behalf of his client; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Christopher J Kopidlansky in court pro-se.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status of counsel. Defendant informs the Court his attorney John Zeckel is on vacation for today's proceedings.   Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Christopher J Kopidlansky in court.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant requests time to obtain counsel.   Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel conference in Branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.     No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with:  Corey H; Christian H; Burnhearts Bar.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Christopher J Kopidlansky in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Defendant Christopher J Kopidlansky in custody.  
Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. 
Defendant entered a plea of not guilty.  
DEFENDANT DOES  NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER  REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 2, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
